abstract: BHP Billiton has hired Bank of America-Merrill Lynch to advise it on a sale of its Ravensthorpe nickel operation, in an auction that could raise $1 billion, a source told Reuters.

lead_paragraph: BHP Billiton has hired Bank of America–Merrill Lynch to advise it on a sale of its Ravensthorpe nickel operation, in an auction which could fetch $1 billion, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

headline.main: BHP Hires BofA-Merrill for Ravensthorpe Sale
